Collaborated with ML engineers to translate technical capabilities into intuitive user experiences

principles.description: Building responsible AI systems that respect privacy and avoid bias

design_philosophy.approach: I believe AI should augment human capabilities, not replace them. My design approach focuses on creating experiences where AI works alongside users, enhancing their abilities while respecting their autonomy and privacy.
design_philosophy.differentiator: What makes my approach unique is my focus on the intersection of human needs and AI capabilities. I design experiences that help users understand and trust AI systems, while ensuring the AI adapts to user preferences over time rather than forcing users to adapt to rigid technological constraints.
